title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Broadcasting (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Broadcasting (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 23 September 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited broadcasting (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2020 (2) order come operation 23 september 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht. 

(2) References to the Department of Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and 
relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, 
from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Department of Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department culture heritage gaeltacht (2) reference department communication climate action environment contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Communications, Climate
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Communications, Climate 

Action and Environment - 

(a) by or under any of the Acts specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 

and 

(b) under the instruments specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

are transferred to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht. 

(2) References to the Minister for Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment contained in any Act or instrument made under an Act and relating 
to any functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the 
Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister communication climate action environment - (a) act specified part 1 schedule (b) instrument specified part 2 schedule transferred minister culture heritage gaeltacht (2) reference minister communication climate action environment contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Communications, Climate 
Action and Environment is a party and the proceedings have reference to 
functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the 
Gaeltacht, the name of the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht shall, 
in so far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be 
substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for Communications, 
Climate Action and Environment or added in the proceedings, as may be 
appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [372] 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment may, in so far as it relates to a function transferred by this Order to 
the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht, be carried on or completed 
from such commencement by the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the 
Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister communication climate action environment may far relates function transferred order minister culture heritage gaeltacht carried completed commencement minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect from 
such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Communications, Climate Action and
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment contained in the memorandum and articles of association of any 
company and relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 7 reference minister communication climate action environment contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Communications, Climate 
Action and Environment in connection with the functions transferred by this 
Order are transferred on the commencement to the Minister for Culture, Heritage 
and the Gaeltacht and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or 
assignment - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Culture, Heritage and 
the Gaeltacht, 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Culture, Heritage 
and the Gaeltacht. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
the 
Culture, Heritage and 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Communications, Climate Action and Environment shall on the request of the 
Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht be transferred into the name of 
the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht. 

this Article, which, on 

the Gaeltacht by

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: Article 3(1)(a)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Article 3(1)(a) 

Acts, functions by or under which are transferred from the Minister for 
Communications, Climate Action and Environment to the Minister for Culture, 
Heritage and the Gaeltacht 

Broadcasting Act 2009 (No. 18 of 2009), other than section 184 

Section 17(2) and (3) and Part 3A of the Competition Act 2002 (No. 14 of 2002) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Part 2 

[372] 5 

Article 3(1)(b) 

Instruments, functions under which are transferred from the Minister for 
Communications, Climate Action and Environment to the Minister for Culture, 
Heritage and the Gaeltacht 

European Communities (Audiovisual Media Services) Regulations 2010 (S.I. 
No. 258 of 2010) (as amended by the European Communities (Audiovisual 
Media Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 247 of 2012)) 

Television Licences Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 851 of 2007) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [372] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
